title: Showing earned chests in collection
body: In the old client, I could see which champions I had earned a chest with when I looked at my owned champions (there was a visual indicator). I don't see a similar indicator in the alpha client. Is there one that I'm missing?

replies.body: Correct, there is no indicator to look for. Hextech crafting for the client update is being worked on. We are trying to reach legacy client parity as fast as possible.
I want the indicator back, but more particularly, I want the hover to still show our highest rank of the season on the champs.

I'm assuming this is only because they haven't fully implemented hextech crafting onto the new client yet but... I also don't see any indicator and would appreciate keeping this feature. Similar to this on the profile screen it doesn't show how many chests you have available or when you are getting new ones. Again, I'm guessing they'll add it in with an update including hextech crafting.

I wanted to post this here ======>>> [Prepare to Test: Collection and Profiles](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion-en/LpwkErKW) but this is more specific. I will second the idea. Alpha client needs the indicator.

I assume it's because they haven't added in hextech to the alpha yet. They'll probably bring in the indicators around when they implement the store. Hextech links to purchasing chests, and they wouldn't want to do that before they've gotten the store page ready for alpha.
